DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate whether insulin treatment insulin pump multiple daily injection ( MDI ) give good outcome mother baby pregnant woman pregestational diabetes . Participants randomize use either insulin pump MDI .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Insulin Pump MDI Pregestational Diabetes During Pregnancy
DOC.detailed_description: Primary outcome composite Cesarian section , instrumental delivery , maternal hypertension , LGA infant , neonatal hypoglycemia SCN admission .
DOC.criteria: subject attend Diabetes Pregnancy Clinic participate hospital type 1 type 2 diabetes least one year first trimester actively attempt pregnancy singleton pregnancy receive intensive insulin therapy judge clinic staff capable use insulin pump age 19 old willing adhere study protocol include monitoring blood glucose level willing take folic acid pregnancy first trimester willing discontinue medication contraindicate pregnancy prior conception weigh le 100 kg ( 220 lb ) prior become pregnant use le 100 unit insulin per day current previous use insulin pump use fertility treatment multiple pregnancy child born major birth defect experience stillbirth multiple early pregnancy loss significant diabetes complication serious medical issue
